other_tests.findings: Generalized spike, polyspike, and slow waves consistent with atypical absence status.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mental status improved within minutes after treatment with intravenous lorazepam.

other_tests.findings: Mild to moderate inflammation, with 47.6% of patients having advanced fibrosis; 2 patients had definite cirrhosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Treatment induced sustained virologic response in 63.5% of patients with persistently normal ALT values.
